adjectives.description: scintillating (comparative more scintillating, superlative most scintillating)

entries.meaning: That scintillates with brief flashes of light; sparkling.
examples: On the scintillating water yellow and blue boats bobbed up and down.

entries.meaning: (figurative) Brilliantly or impressively clever, exciting, amusing or witty.
examples: Her sketches and tales may be said to be cleverly written. They are lively, easy, conventional, scintillating with a species of sarcastic wit, which might be termed good were it in any respect original.
